dataset_id: VIIRS/NPP CGF Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 375m SIN Grid V001
title: VIIRS/NPP CGF Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 375m SIN Grid V001
summary: This data set contains daily 'cloud-free' snow cover produced from the VIIRS/NPP Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 375m SIN Grid, Version 1 snow cover product. A cloud-gap-filled algorithm is utilized to replace ‘cloud-covered’ pixels with ‘cloud-free pixels’ for the purpose of estimating the snow cover that may exist under current cloud cover. The data are provided daily and mapped to a 375 m sinusoidal grid.
